attributes.action: Government Unemployment Insurance tied to Universal Credit.
attributes.additional_details: The USA and Canada have it, it would cure homelessness and work force shortages completely.
attributes.background: Title says it all, remove payments from Universal Credit so it is just to keep track of your job seeking.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want to see changes to Universal Credit, but we're not sure if you want the Government to just end all payments through Universal Credit, or do something else. The title of your petition refers to "Unemployment Insurance", but it's not clear if you want the Government to introduce this, and if so how it would work.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
